posts.post_title: Mordecai Brown (Portrait) - T206 Piedmont - SGC 2.5 - SOLD
posts.post_content:

Piedmont 150 Factory 25 back

Great looking example of this card

Newly graded SGC 2.5 (GD+)

Thanks.
